text: Ricky Martin is the eponymous debut solo studio album recorded by Puerto Rican singer Ricky Martin, It was released by Sony Discos and Sony Music Mexico November 26, 1991 (see 1991 in music). ==Track listing== © MCMXCI. Sony Music Entertainment (México). S.A. de C.V. ==Chart performance== Chart (1992) Peak position US Billboard Latin Pop AlbumsBillboard peak positions .
